page.title: 12SHOPS
page.content:
We have plenty of small shops in Swillington. Here is a list of them:- {Two General Stores, One Pet Shop, Two {Mini Markets, Three Newsagents, Three {Hairdressers, Two Grocers, One Off- {licence, One Nusery, One Chemist, Two {Electrical Shops, One Butchers Shop, {One Lawnderette, One Fish and Chip {Shop, One Post Office and Two Garages. We have to go to nearby larger villages to find a supermarket.
One of the most popular shops is the Spar because it opens longer hours and the owner is very friendly. They often have special offers. Because it is near to school the Spar is like a tuck shop to the children. We have to go to {Leeds, Wakefield}or other nearby towns to buy clothes, shoes, furniture, etc.
